name: Space On The Page
description:
Space On The Page is my entry for the No Need For Thought Game Jam, in which we had to make a game based on an idea given by a random idea generator. My prompt was "A short-and-sweet mashup of the bullet hell and puzzle game genres in which you need to collect colours".

What I settled on is a galaga-esque space shooter with a sketchy art style, where you must kill enemies to collect color orbs that you mix together to form a given color. You get one point each time you do this during the 4 1/2 minute level. Yes, there is a boss at the end. Taking damage from black orbs reduces your color. Your collection of orbs is also your health, so if your ship goes completely dark: YOU LOSE!

I streamed 90% of the process of making this game, which you can check out here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9kbykhF6FZ__Sj-d3rnrNgx39t9Y_JYy

This was my first ever full Unity project, so I apologize for the fact that you can't change the resolution... so you're stuck with 1920x1080 until I learn how to fix that. What do you want from me? I had limited time :)
